Question.Subject: Has anyone here wrote or is writing for eHow?
Question.Content: I just started and I want to know if you really make money doing it. I am not really looking for a work at home job but I wanted to start writing in my free time and I ran across eHow. It stated that it pays. I read everything about how it works but I would like to hear from someone that has or is doing this. How much to do you make every month and how long did it take to reach that?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Wow this is interesting! You can be paid? I love that site, (I don't write for it), however if it pays I most certainly will start! I'm going to save your question! Thanks!

Answer.Content: Wow this is interesting! You can be paid? I love that site, (I don't write for it), however if it pays I most certainly will start! I'm going to save your question! Thanks!
